typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Eldon Base for stackable storage shelf, platinum} as string,
		{Muhammed MacIntyre} as string,
		{3} as string,
		{-213.25} as string,
		{38.94} as string,
		{35} as string,
		Nunavut as string,
		{Storage & Organization} as string,
		{0.8} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dataFlowCSV
dataFlowCSV select(mapColumn(
		title = {Eldon Base for stackable storage shelf, platinum},
		name = {Muhammed MacIntyre},
		num = {3},
		price = {38.94},
		age = {35},
		location = Nunavut,
		compay = {Storage & Organization},
		doub = {0.8}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['name1'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		name1 = name,
		price,
		age,
		location1 = location,
		doub
	)) ~> sink1
